<linkAem>Automatic Enhanced Match<\/link: <linkAem>Automatic Enhanced Match</linkAem> is enabled by default to match more of your website visitors and conversions to people on Pinterest. You can manage this in Settings.
Using conversion tags means you agree to: Using conversion tags means you agree to our <linkGuidelines>Ad Guidelines</linkGuidelines> and <linkTerms>Ad Data Terms</linkTerms>.
